Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. 23 kg/mol (average molecular weight, Mn)
2. 78 kg/mol (weight-average molecular weight, Mw)

The polydispersity index (PDI) is a measure of the distribution of molecular weights in a polymer, but it is not a direct measure of the value of a material property. Therefore, it can be removed from the list of relevant entities.
